document_data.mainbody:
Yerle was a guardswoman who worked for the Zhentarim during the late 15 century DR.
Yerle had fair skin and wore her hair in curled braids along the top, with sheared sides. She wore a suit of simple, studded leather armor and leather gloves.
In the , Yerle was tasked with protecting Roah Moonglow during her dealings with the cult of the Absolute at the Shattered Sanctum. The Zhentarim and the cult were trading in slaves and dangerous amounts of smokepowder. Yerlo and her fellow guard Erna watched over a storerom in the sanctum, that held barrels upon barrels of the highly-volatile substance.
